name: Camp Network
description: Camp Network is a purpose-built Layer-1 blockchain for powering AI agents trained on provenance-backed, user-owned IP. Camp's Autonomous IP Layer enables anyone to tokenize IP — music, images, videos, even personal data — and register it onchain for AI training, remixing, and monetization. Its architecture prioritizes gasless IP registration and royalty distribution, and supports isolated execution environments tailored for agent-based workflows and automated licensing. Developers can launch dedicated app chains with isolated blockspace and compute, offering the flexibility and scalability needed for high-performance workloads.
